item.title: About Us
item.description: Welcome to Codify, the programming summer camp for aspiring programmers of all ages! At Codify, we believe that coding is not just a skill, but a way of thinking. Our mission is to inspire and empower the next generation of programmers to harness the power of technology and use it to make a positive impact on the world. Our experienced instructors are passionate about teaching coding and technology skills in a fun and engaging way.

item.title: Team
item.description: Veer Chopra and Aarav Maheshwari Veer Chopra (Co-Founder): Hello! My name is Veer Chopra, and I am a co founder of codify. I am a sophomore at Scrips Ranch High School, and I love anything relating to computers, especially software algorithms, which has enabled me to make the USACO silver division. Over the years, Iâ€™ve learned coding in multiple languages, mainly C++, Python, and web development. In addition, math and cybersecurity are a big part of my life, participating in AIME and the CyberPatriot National Championship, in which we took first.
